name: Vigilant Technologies
tagline: Your Eye on the Technology World
description:
Vigilant Technologies is a leading national provider of Data Center hosting and colocation, Managed IT Services, IT Infrastructure, and IT Consulting solutions based in Chandler, AZ.
Offering a comprehensive suite of IT services, combined with highly-secure, reliable, and energy-efficient data centers across the country, Vigilant Technologies provides customers with complete cloud computing solutions addressing disaster recovery, data protection, and virtualization.
